meanings.definition: A unit of genetic distance equal to one percent recombination between two loci.
meanings.sent1: In genetics, a centimorgan represents a small distance between genes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use centimorgans to measure the distance between genetic markers.
meanings.sent3: The centimorgan decided to take a break from measuring genetic distances and went on a vacation.
meanings.sent4: The concept of a centimorgan bridges the gap between theoretical and practical genetics.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the centimorgan helps researchers map out the human genome more accurately.
